Sentencas: Solid oxide electrolyzer cells (SOECs) are devises which recently have attracted lots of attention due to their advantages.
Titulo: Optimization of BSCF-SDC composite air electrode for intermediate temperature solid oxide electrolyzer cell

Sentencas: Their high operating temperature leads to mechanical compatibility issues such as thermal expansion mismatch between layers of material in the cell.
Titulo: Optimization of BSCF-SDC composite air electrode for intermediate temperature solid oxide electrolyzer cell

Sentencas: The aim of this study is to mitigate the issue of thermal expansion mismatch between Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta (BSCF) and samaria doped ceria, Sm0.2Ce0.8O1.9 (SDC), enhance the triple-phase boundaries and improve the adhesion of the electrode to the electrolytes, hence improve the cell performance.
Titulo: Optimization of BSCF-SDC composite air electrode for intermediate temperature solid oxide electrolyzer cell

Sentencas: To make BSCF more thermo-mechanically compatible with the SDC electrolyte, the formation of a composite electrode by introducing SDC as the corn positing material is proposed.
Titulo: Optimization of BSCF-SDC composite air electrode for intermediate temperature solid oxide electrolyzer cell

Sentencas: In this study, 10 wt.%, 20 wt.%, 30 wt.%, 40 wt.%, and 50 wt.% of commercial SDC powder was mixed with BSCF powder, prepared by sol-gel method, to make the composite air electrode.
Titulo: Optimization of BSCF-SDC composite air electrode for intermediate temperature solid oxide electrolyzer cell

Sentencas: After successfully synthesizing the BSCF-SDC/YSZ-SDC/Ni-YSZ electrolyter cell, the electrochemical performance was tested for the intermediate-temperature SOEC (IT-SOEC), over the temperature range of 650-800 degrees C.
Titulo: Optimization of BSCF-SDC composite air electrode for intermediate temperature solid oxide electrolyzer cell

Sentencas: The microstructure of each sample was studied by field emission electron microscopy (FESEM, JEOL, JSM 6340F) for possible pin holes.
Titulo: Optimization of BSCF-SDC composite air electrode for intermediate temperature solid oxide electrolyzer cell

Sentencas: The result of this study proves that the sample with 20% SDC-80% BSCF shows the highest performance among the investigated cells.
Titulo: Optimization of BSCF-SDC composite air electrode for intermediate temperature solid oxide electrolyzer cell
